text: Is leaf mainly affected?
Any distinct smell produced from affected portions of the plant?
Is stunting observed in the affected plant?
Is any insect vector involved?
Is reddening observed in any part of the plant?
Is internode affected?
Is black colored whip like structure observed between leaf sheaths?
Is there profuse tillering?
Is reddening observed in the midrib of the plant specifically?
Is drying of plants observed from long distance?
Is central blackening of internal sett observed?
Are small, elongated yellowish or reddish brown spots visible on both leaf surfaces?
Is there pithiness and boat shaped cavities in the middle of the internodes?
Is there orange pin head dots on internode?
Is there boring observed  in plants?
Is there boreholes at the base of the shoot?
Is there boreholes plugged with excreta in the nodal region?
Is there boreholes at the top of the shoot?
Does infested leaf look like white and black dots?
Is there deposition of wolly matter on ground or soil?
Is there pinkish oval insect beneath leaf sheath?
Is there appearance of yellowish green color in leaves?
Is there appearance of red purplish discolouration in leaves?
Is there reduction in root development?
Is there dieback of older leaf?
Is there appearnce of orange yellow color in older lower leaf?
Is there rusty or freckled appearance spotting on older leaf?
